about_the_game:
This DLC contains wallpapers of all girls presented in Poon Puzzle, each one has 3 versions: SFW, Lingerie, Nude.

Ultra high quality, crisp artworks.
The native resolution of ALL artworks is 4K or greater.
Wallpapers come in 6000 x 4000, JPG with 100% quality.
Also available in 8K resolution (12000x8000 pixels).

This DLC contains static JPG images only!
You can find them in the "wallpapers" directory next to the main game executable ( C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Poon Puzzle\wallpapers by default )

content_descriptors.notes: Might be not safe for work. Contains Sexual Content & Nudity.

detailed_description:
This DLC contains wallpapers of all girls presented in Poon Puzzle, each one has 3 versions: SFW, Lingerie, Nude.

Ultra high quality, crisp artworks.
The native resolution of ALL artworks is 4K or greater.
Wallpapers come in 6000 x 4000, JPG with 100% quality.
Also available in 8K resolution (12000x8000 pixels).

This DLC contains static JPG images only!
You can find them in the "wallpapers" directory next to the main game executable ( C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Poon Puzzle\wallpapers by default )
legal_notice:
Original artworks by WindWalker.

This game is a work of fiction. All characters or associations are a product of author's imagination; names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to other products or people (living or dead) or places is entirely coincidental.

Every appearing character is over 18 years old.
